attributes.action: ensure that terminal cancer victim and charity cyclist becomes a Dame in the New Year's Honours List
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Basically, I would like this inspiring woman to receive the recognition she deserves for her charity cycling efforts, not least crossing the USA this year.

If Kelly Holmes become a Dame on the strength of two Olympic Gold Medals, then Jane must be worth it as well

rejection.details: Coudl you put the nominee's name in the petition in full please. We have altered our policy on honours petitions and would now like to accept this one, but we should have her name in the petition.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
